description: Try our easy to follow Fruit Ice Blocks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Fruit Ice Blocks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To unmould, hold the tray under cold running water for 1 minute or until the iceblocks loosen.
